channel.title: CVE Feed for qqworld -- QQWorld Auto Save Images
channel.description: The latest CVEs for qqworld -- QQWorld Auto Save Images

item.title: CVE-2024-1324|2024-06-01T06:51:52.577Z -- qqworld -- QQWorld Auto Save Images
item.description: The QQWorld Auto Save Images plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the save_remote_images_get_auto_saved_results() function hooked via a norpriv AJAX in all versions up to, and including, 1.9.8. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to retrieve the contents of arbitrary posts that may not be public.
